alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Decatur; Jennings (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:30PM EDT until July 24 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Decatur County in central Indiana... Southeastern Bartholomew County in central Indiana... Northern Jennings County in southeastern Indiana... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Greensburg, or 16 miles east of Columbus, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Westport around 535 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
